attributes.action: Remark the GCSE papers sat over the summer of 2012 free of charge
attributes.additional_details:
Students who sat their GCSE exams over the
summer of 2012 should not be charged for requesting their GCSE papers to be remarked due to the harsh and unfair marking of the papers

If 'every child matters' then every child should have the opportunity to have their GCSE papers fairly marked- they can't help what year they were born in.

London spent over £9.7 billion on a three week event and hoped to leave a legacy.
Forget legacy, remarking the papers will really impact people's lives and the future of this country.
